start.npc_text: Oh good, another customer. I'm Madame Cluckstra, psychic chicken extraordinaire. Five copper for your fortune, or I can just tell you now: it's bad.

psychic_chicken.npc_text: What, you've never seen a psychic chicken? Next you'll tell me you've never seen a talking sword or a healing potion. This world's weird, kid. I just monetized it.

tell_fortune.npc_text: Let me consult the mystic corn kernels... *pecks at ground* ... Ah yes, I see your future clearly. You will soon walk somewhere. With your legs. Probably forward. That'll be five copper.

dont_believe.npc_text: Oh, a skeptic! Let me predict your future then: You'll continue being wrong about things. See? I'm already right. The universe loves irony almost as much as it loves proving skeptics wrong.

learn_prophecy.npc_text: I ate a wizard once. Well, pecked at his remains. Bears got him first. But I absorbed his mystical essence! Or salmonella. Hard to tell the difference, honestly. Both give you visions.

prove_psychic.npc_text: Fine. You're thinking about... something. You recently came from... a place. And you're going to... another place. BEHOLD MY POWER! That'll be ten copper for the demonstration.

ridiculous.npc_text: Ridiculous? RIDICULOUS? You fight slimes for money and drink mysterious red liquids for health, but a psychic chicken is where you draw the line? Check your priorities, hero.

not_real_prophecy.npc_text: Oh, you want REAL prophecy? Fine. *dramatic voice* 'When the moon rises on the longest day, you shall face your greatest challenge: finding a bathroom in the dungeon.' Happy now?

pays_fortune.npc_text: A satisfied customer! Tell your friends about Madame Cluckstra's mystic wisdom! Side effects may include: disappointment, existential dread, and the realization you just paid a chicken. No refunds.

choices.text: What do you do with money?

better_fortune.npc_text: Greedy! Fine, premium fortune coming up. *clears throat* 'You will find great treasure!' There. It's probably a potato. I find those count as treasure when you're hungry enough.

lucky_guess.npc_text: Lucky? LUCKY? I'll have you know I have a 12% accuracy rate! That's better than most weather forecasters! Plus, my failures are more entertaining. That's worth something.

something_specific.npc_text: Specific? Alright. Tomorrow at dawn, you'll wake up. Unless you don't, in which case my prophecy is about your eternal slumber. See? I'm right either way. It's called hedging your bets.

disturbing.npc_text: Disturbing? Try living it! One day you're pecking corn, next day you're seeing visions of everyone's disappointing futures. Spoiler alert: yours involves a lot of running into walls looking for secret doors.

proves_nothing.npc_text: Proves nothing? I just read your mind! Sort of. Look, psychic powers are like cooking - it's more art than science. And I'm a chicken. Lower your expectations.

good_point.npc_text: Finally, some sense! Now, would you like the Basic Doom Fortune, the Deluxe Catastrophe Reading, or our special today: The Inevitable Disappointment Combo? All equally vague!

give_quest.npc_text: A quest? From me? Fine. Your quest is to find meaning in a world where chickens give quests. Reward: existential crisis. Oh wait, you already have that. Quest complete! You're welcome.

concerning.npc_text: Oh NOW you're interested! Yes, dungeon bathrooms are a real issue. Why do you think heroes are always in such a hurry? It's not urgency, it's biology. Pro tip: always go before the boss fight.

another_fortune.npc_text: Addicted already? Fine. Your new fortune: 'You will soon meet a tall, dark stranger.' It's probably your own shadow. Counts though. Shadows are very tall when the sun's low.

wheres_treasure.npc_text: The treasure? Oh, it's in a place. Near some stuff. Look for the thing next to the other thing. You can't miss it! Unless you do. Which you will. Because I made it up.

only_twelve.npc_text: ONLY twelve? Do you know how hard prophecy is? The future keeps changing! Every time someone makes a choice, boom, new timeline. It's exhausting. Plus I'm working with a bird brain here. Literally.

secret_doors.npc_text: Oh honey, SO many secret doors. Behind waterfalls, suspicious cracks, oddly colored walls... The real secret? Half of them just lead to more disappointment. The other half? Spiders.

read_mind_now.npc_text: Reading... reading... You're thinking that this chicken is full of it! See? Nailed it. That'll be five copper for the accurate mind reading. What? I never said I'd tell you something you didn't know.

basic_doom.npc_text: Basic Doom, excellent choice! *mystical pecking* Your future contains... misfortune! Specifically, you'll step in something wet while wearing socks. The horror! That's five copper.

real_quest.npc_text: FINE. There's a merchant two towns over who sells 'mystic chicken feed.' He charges ten gold per bag. It's just regular corn. Go tell him he's a fraud. There, a real quest with real irony!

other_tips.npc_text: Tips? Sure! Tip one: Stop taking advice from chickens. Tip two: Those 'ancient unreadable runes'? They usually just say 'pull lever.' Tip three: The cake is always a lie. ALWAYS.

one_more.npc_text: Last one, on the house: 'Your greatest enemy is...' *dramatic pause* 'YOUR OWN EXPECTATIONS!' Also probably some boss with too many hit points, but mainly the expectations thing.

useless.npc_text: Useless? I'm a CHICKEN giving PROPHECIES. What did you expect, GPS coordinates? Maybe a detailed map with a big X? This isn't that kind of game, buddy.

choices.text: What kind of game is it?

best_shot.npc_text: My BEST prophecy? Alright, lean in close. *whispers* 'The shopkeeper is ripping you off.' There! 100% accurate, applies everywhere, no refunds. You're welcome for this life-changing wisdom.

what_about_treasure.npc_text: Oh, there's treasure. Usually guarded by something with too many teeth and not enough patience. But hey, at least the spiders are free! Silver lining: they're more afraid of you. Copper lining: no they're not.

you_got_me.npc_text: See? I AM psychic! Just not in useful ways. I can also predict that you'll breathe soon. And blink! Look at that, you just did. I'm on fire today! Metaphorically. Please don't actually set me on fire.

too_real.npc_text: Too real? That's my specialty! I predict the mundane horrors everyone ignores. Next up: you'll bite your tongue while eating. Not sure when. But it's coming. It's ALWAYS coming.

hypocritical.npc_text: Hypocritical? Me? I never said I WASN'T a fraud. I'm just an HONEST fraud. Big difference! I tell you upfront that my prophecies are vague nonsense. That's integrity!

actually_helpful.npc_text: Helpful? I'm helping? Quick, someone write this down! 'Local chicken accidentally useful, immediately regrets it.' This ruins my reputation as a mystical fraud!

profound.npc_text: Profound? No, that's just what happens when you run out of real prophecies. Start spouting philosophy and people think you're deep. Watch: 'The river of time flows toward an ocean of regret.' See? Meaningless!

what_kind_game.npc_text: The kind where you pay chickens for bad advice, apparently! Look around - nothing makes sense. Might as well embrace it. Now, want to hear about your love life? Spoiler: also disappointing.

knew_it.npc_text: Of course you knew it! Everyone knows it! But do we stop buying? No! We need those overpriced potions! It's called 'the economy' and we're all trapped in it. Even me. Especially me.

risk_it.npc_text: Brave! Stupid, but brave! Here's a freebie: the treasure behind the waterfall? It's always boots. Slightly better boots than you have, but still. Boots. The real treasure was the spiders you fought along the way.

growing_on_me.npc_text: Like a fungus, I hope! That's my business model - be just annoying enough to be memorable, but just entertaining enough that you don't eat me. It's a delicate balance.

stop_cursing.npc_text: It's not a curse, it's statistics! These things happen to everyone! I just remind you they're coming. Would you prefer surprise tongue-biting? No? Then I'm providing a service!

actually_fair.npc_text: Finally, someone who appreciates honest dishonesty! You know what? You're alright. Here's a real tip: check behind the big tree north of town. Sometimes there's... actually, no. I've said too much. Forget I mentioned it.

more_real_advice.npc_text: Real advice? From me? Fine, but don't spread it around: Save before boss fights. Revolutionary, I know. Also, that 'cursed' sword in the shop? It's just purple. Not cursed. Shopkeeper's colorblind.

beautiful_though.npc_text: Beautiful? It's gibberish! I combined 'time,' 'water,' and 'sad' - boom, instant philosophy! Watch: 'Mountains of possibility crumble into valleys of reality.' I could do this all day. Please don't make me.

tell_anyway.npc_text: Your love life? *pecks mystically* You'll meet someone special! They'll have... a face. And probably hair. Unless they don't. Either way, it'll end in either happiness or tears. Definitely one of those.

why_need_money.npc_text: Bribes, mostly. You think the farmer just LETS me talk to adventurers all day? I pay him to look the other way. Plus, I'm saving up for a tiny wizard hat. Don't judge me.

need_boots.npc_text: Everyone needs better boots! It's the eternal struggle. Your boots are never good enough. There's always a slightly better pair behind a waterfall guarded by spiders. It's metaphorical or something.

never_eat.npc_text: That's what they all say! Until winter comes and the vegetables run out. Then suddenly I look 'tender' and 'well-marbled.' But sure, we're 'friends.' I believe you. *nervous cluck*

terrible_service.npc_text: Terrible? My Yelp reviews say 'inconsistent' and 'oddly specific about tongue injuries.' That's practically glowing for a psychic chicken! You should see what they say about the fortune-telling fish.

tell_more.npc_text: I've said too much! The Tree Council will have my feathers! I mean... there's no Tree Council. And they definitely don't hide treasure. And they're absolutely not watching us right now. *nervous cluck*

genuinely_helpful.npc_text: Stop saying that! You'll ruin my reputation! I'm supposed to be a mystical fraud, not a helpful hint guide! Next you'll expect actual prophecies! The pressure!

do_another.npc_text: *sighs* 'The sandwich of destiny awaits in the refrigerator of fate.' There! Philosophy! That'll be five copper, or ten if you want me to explain what it means. Spoiler: it means nothing.

wizard_hat.npc_text: Don't knock it! A tiny pointed hat would make me look 37% more mystical. I've done the math. Plus, it would keep the rain off. Do you know how miserable wet feathers are? Actually, don't answer that.

which_waterfall.npc_text: Oh, you want SPECIFICS now? It's the wet one. With water. Falling. Look, I'm a mystic, not a cartographer. Check every waterfall! It's good exercise! Builds character! And spider-fighting skills!

vegetarian.npc_text: Oh good, another vegetarian! That makes... one. In this entire kingdom. The cows appreciate it. Well, they would if they could talk. Which they can't. That's just me. Lucky me.

fish_too.npc_text: Oh, you don't know about Finnegan the Prophetic Trout? He predicts the weather. He's always wrong. Fish don't understand clouds. But he's cheaper than me, so... competition.

tree_council.npc_text: I'VE SAID TOO MUCH! Look, just... if you see any suspicious trees, don't mention my name. And definitely don't say the password. It's not 'branch.' Don't even try 'branch.' Forget I said 'branch.'

one_more_tip.npc_text: FINE! Last one: The final boss? He's allergic to cheese. Don't ask how I know. Just... trust me on this one. Bring cheese. Lots of cheese. Gouda works best.

take_explanation.npc_text: *clears throat importantly* The sandwich represents your dreams. The refrigerator is society. The destiny is lunch. Together they mean: you're hungry and overthinking things. That's fifteen copper total.

support_dream.npc_text: You... you do? That's the nicest thing anyone's said to me since the farmer's daughter called me 'marginally less annoying than the rooster.' I might cry. Do chickens cry? I'm about to find out.

worst_directions.npc_text: Worst directions? I prefer 'creatively vague.' It's not my fault geography exists! Besides, the journey is more important than the destination. Unless the destination has treasure. Then it's definitely about the destination.

why_can_talk.npc_text: Cosmic accident? Wizard's curse? Ate some bad mushrooms? Who knows! I try not to think about it. Existential crises are bad for business. Speaking of which, want your fortune told?

better_than_fish.npc_text: Well, I should hope so! I have LEGS! And WINGS! Useless wings, but still! Plus, my predictions rhyme sometimes. 'Your future is bleak, you'll spring a leak.' See? Poetry! Fish can't do that!

definitely_branch.npc_text: NO! It's not... I mean... Look, a distraction! *points wing randomly* Is that your quest objective over there? No? Well, it was worth a shot. Please don't tell the trees I told you.

cheese_really.npc_text: Look, I don't make the rules of boss allergies. I just report them. Via vague psychic visions. That may or may not be cheese-dreams. Point is: bring cheese or don't. I'm not your mother.

worth_every_coin.npc_text: A satisfied customer! Please leave a review on my nest. 'Five stars, would have existential crisis again!' Tell your friends! But not your enemies. They don't deserve my wisdom.

dont_cry.npc_text: *sniffles* Too late! Look what you've done! A crying psychic chicken! This is so undignified! My reputation! My mystique! Ruined by kindness! *sob* Thank you, though.

youre_impossible.npc_text: Impossible? I prefer 'enigmatic.' Or 'mystically challenging.' Or just 'annoying.' I'll take any of those. Put it on my business card: 'Madame Cluckstra - Impossibly Vague Since Last Tuesday.'

full_circle.npc_text: Like the circle of life, but more annoying and with worse predictions! That's my brand! Consistency in inconsistency! Now, did you want that fortune or are we just going to keep talking about my existence?

leak_where.npc_text: Your roof, your boat, your confidence - who knows? I'm not a plumber, I'm a mystic! The beauty of vague prophecies is they always come true eventually! You'll see! Or not. That's vague too.

going_to_try.npc_text: Wait! Don't! Or do! I can't stop you! Just... if a tree asks who told you, say it was the fish. Finnegan's had it too good for too long. Stupid fish with his stupid accurate weather predictions.

best_tip_ever.npc_text: Best tip? Well, I— wait, really? You mean it? My tips are the best? Oh no, I'm having feelings again! Quick, insult me before I develop self-worth!

will_do.npc_text: Excellent! Spread the word about Madame Cluckstra's Adequate Prophecies! 'Not the worst!' 'Occasionally accurate!' 'Better than talking to yourself!' These reviews write themselves!

youre_welcome.npc_text: Great, now I'm emotionally compromised AND a fraud. This is the worst day since I became sentient! Which was last Tuesday. Everything's been downhill since the awareness kicked in.

last_tuesday_again.npc_text: It was a very significant Tuesday! That's when I realized I could think! Do you know how terrifying that is? One day you're pecking corn, next day you're contemplating mortality. Tuesday's are cursed.

fortune_please.npc_text: One final fortune! *dramatic pecking* In your future I see... the end of this conversation! It's happening soon! Like, really soon. Right about... now-ish. That's free, because I like you.

hate_this.npc_text: Good! Hatred is a strong emotion! That'll be five copper for the emotional journey. What? Therapy's expensive! Even bad therapy from a chicken. ESPECIALLY bad therapy from a chicken.

jealous_of_fish.npc_text: I'm not jealous! I just think it's unfair that he gets to be right about rain while I'm stuck predicting existential dread! But whatever! I'm not bitter! *pecks ground angrily*

youre_amazing.npc_text: Stop it! My cynical facade is crumbling! Next thing you know, I'll be giving ACTUAL helpful advice! The other mystic animals will mock me! 'Oh look, Cluckstra's gone SOFT!'

glowing_endorsements.npc_text: Right? I should put them on a sign! 'Madame Cluckstra: Technically Not Lying!' Business would boom! Or plummet. Prophecy unclear. Ask again later. Much later. When I figure it out.

being_aware_tough.npc_text: Right? Ignorance was bliss! Now I know about mortality, taxes, and that my eggs could have been chickens! It's too much! But hey, at least I can charge for predictions now. Silver lining!

tuesdays_cursed.npc_text: Finally someone who gets it! Mondays get all the hate, but Tuesdays? That's when the real existential dread kicks in. We should start a support group. 'Tuesday Survivors Anonymous.'

accurate_for_once.npc_text: I know! It's almost like I planned it! Which I didn't. I'm not that clever. But hey, even a broken mystic chicken is right twice a day! Wait, that's clocks. Whatever!

not_paying.npc_text: Fair! I wouldn't pay me either! But remember - you spent precious minutes of your life talking to a 'psychic' chicken. You can't get those back. That's the REAL scam!

totally_jealous.npc_text: FINE! I'm jealous! He's got a pond! I've got dirt! He predicts rain, I predict sadness! But you know what? At least I can walk. Take that, Finnegan! *triumphant cluck*

let_them_talk.npc_text: You're right! I'll be the most helpful, least cynical psychic chicken in the kingdom! For about five minutes. Then I'll remember the futility of existence and go back to being sarcastic. It's called growth!

capitalism_wins.npc_text: Every time! Even in death, I'll probably be sold at market price. But until then, I'm making BANK on bad prophecies! The system works! Sort of! Not really! But I have coins now!

ill_join.npc_text: Great! First meeting: next Tuesday! We'll complain about Tuesday... ON a Tuesday! It's poetic justice! Or just confusing. Bring snacks. Misery loves company, but it REALLY loves snacks.

close_enough.npc_text: My life motto! 'Close enough' has gotten me this far! Well, 'this far' is being a talking chicken who lies to adventurers for money, but still! It's a living!

time_well_wasted.npc_text: That's the spirit! Time enjoyed is never wasted! Unless you didn't enjoy this. Then it's definitely wasted. But hey, at least you met a talking chicken! That's... something!

feel_better.npc_text: Actually... yes! Petty jealousy is surprisingly therapeutic! I should do this more often! Tomorrow I'll complain about the mystic owl. She thinks she's SO wise. It's just big eyes!

baby_steps.npc_text: Exactly! Today, helpful advice. Tomorrow, actual accurate prophecies! Next week, probably back to cynical lies. But progress is progress! Even backwards progress!

bring_chips.npc_text: Chips! Yes! Salty snacks for salty attitudes! This support group is already better than my business model! Which isn't saying much, but still! Progress!

best_part_day.npc_text: That's either really sweet or really sad! Either way, I'll take the compliment! Tell everyone about the amazing psychic chicken! Leave out the 'fraud' part. Marketing!

owl_too.npc_text: Oh, you haven't met Hootsworth? 'Whoooo seeks wisdom?' So pretentious! We all seek wisdom, Hootsworth! You're not special! Just nocturnal! Anyway, I've said too much. Poultry politics.

not_progress.npc_text: You're right! It's more like... progr-less? Regress? Look, I'm a chicken trying her best in a world that makes no sense. Cut me some slack! Or don't. I predict you won't.

its_a_plan.npc_text: The best plan! Better than my business plan, which was 'talk to strangers for money.' Although that's working out okay. Life's weird. Embrace it! Or don't! Free will!

kingdom_weird.npc_text: Weird? This kingdom has talking animals, magic potions, and heroes who smash pottery for money. I'm the LEAST weird thing here! But yes, it's very weird. Good weird though!

believe_in_you.npc_text: Stop! You're making me feel feelings again! Next you'll tell me I have 'potential' and 'worth!' I'm not emotionally equipped for this! I'm a chicken! A fraud chicken!

words_to_live.npc_text: I should embroider that on a pillow! 'Life's weird - A chicken.' It'll sell for dozens! Of copper! I'll be moderately successful! The dream!

wonderful_fraud.npc_text: I'm putting that on my business card! 'Madame Cluckstra: A Wonderful Fraud!' It's honest AND flattering! You're a marketing genius! Or I have low standards. Both!

id_buy_one.npc_text: Pre-orders open! Just send payment to... wait, I don't have an address. I live in a coop. Send it to 'That Chicken, The Farm, You Know The One.' Postal service loves me!

both_is_good.npc_text: You get it! You really get it! This is the best conversation I've had since... ever! The bar was low, but you cleared it! With style! Come back anytime!

i_will.npc_text: Promise? Don't promise. Promises are just future disappointments. But maybe come back? I'll have new terrible prophecies! Same low prices! It'll be adequately entertaining!

see_you_soon.npc_text: Soon? How soon? Wait, don't tell me! I'll predict it! You'll return when... you return! Nailed it! See? Getting better already! Or worse. Definitely one of those!

on_it.npc_text: Excellent! I'll expect payment in exactly never o'clock! But seriously, thanks for the support. Now shoo! I have other heroes to disappoint!

great_address.npc_text: Right? The postal service hates it! But they deliver anyway. Probably out of pity. Or fear. I peck very accurately when annoyed.

will_do_bye.npc_text: Perfect! Spread the word about my adequacy! 'Madame Cluckstra: Not the worst!' It's catchy! Now go forth and be disappointed elsewhere!

youre_the_best.npc_text: The best? THE BEST? I'm having an emotion! Is this pride? It feels weird! Quick, leave before I start believing in myself!

nailed_it_bye.npc_text: I DID nail it! Just like I nailed that prophecy about you leaving soon! Which is now! Goodbye, marketing genius!

perfect_branding.npc_text: Right? I should trademark it! 'Wonderful Fraud' merchandise! T-shirts! Mugs! Tiny chicken-sized wizard hats! I'm gonna be rich! In spirit!

chase_dream.npc_text: I will! I'll chase it like a chicken chases... whatever chickens chase. Bugs? Dreams? The meaning of life? Anyway, bye!

youve_got_this_bye.npc_text: I've got this! Whatever 'this' is! Probably disappointment, but optimistic disappointment! Thanks for believing in me!

best_fraud.npc_text: The BEST fraud! That's going on my resume! If chickens had resumes! Which we don't! But if we did! BEST. FRAUD. EVER!

favorite_fraud_bye.npc_text: Your FAVORITE fraud? I'm touched! Genuinely! This is the nicest thing anyone's ever... I'm getting emotional. Go! GO BEFORE I CRY!

too_weird_for_me.npc_text: Too weird? That's fair! Not everyone can handle talking poultry and bear politicians. Try the normal kingdom down the road. They have regular chickens. Boring!

love_it_bye.npc_text: Love it? LOVE IT? You're my new favorite customer! Come back soon! I'll have worse prophecies! It'll be terrible! You'll love it!

best_kind.npc_text: Exactly! Good weird is the best weird! Like pineapple on pizza or socks with sandals! Controversial but confident! That's us!

youre_inspiring.npc_text: Inspiring? Me? A fraud chicken? Your standards are wonderfully low! I appreciate that! Makes my job easier!

perfect_bye.npc_text: Perfect? Nothing's perfect! Especially not me! But I'll take the compliment! Now go! Be imperfect elsewhere!

try_harder_2.npc_text: Try harder? I'm a CHICKEN! This IS me trying hard! You try predicting the future with a brain full of corn! It's not easy!

good_luck_bye.npc_text: Thanks! I'll need it! Luck is just preparation meeting opportunity. I have neither! But optimism! Sort of! Bye!

love_it.npc_text: You love it? Then you'll LOVE my premium fortunes! Now with 20% more vagueness! Same low accuracy! Double the confusion!

goodbye_simple_2.npc_text: Simple goodbye? Fine! No prophecy about your departure? No ominous warnings? Just... bye? Boring! But bye!

will_do_2.npc_text: Excellent! My reputation spreads! Soon everyone will know about the adequately fraudulent chicken! Marketing!

secret_safe_final.npc_text: Good! My fraudulent reputation remains intact! Can't have people thinking I'm actually helpful! Bad for the mystique!

goodbye_simple.npc_text: Simple goodbye? I can do that! Goodbye! See? Simple! No prophecies! No drama! Just bye! Weird, right?

see_you_bye.npc_text: See you Tuesday! Or any day ending in 'y' that makes you question existence! They're all equally terrible! Bye!

cant_wait_2.npc_text: The enthusiasm! It's infectious! Like bird flu but emotional! See you at the meeting! Bring your existential dread!

keep_trying_bye.npc_text: I'll keep trying! Failing upward is still a direction! Thanks for the encouragement! Now go encourage someone competent!

you_do_you.npc_text: I'll do me! Which is a fraudulent chicken! It's not much but it's honest work! Wait, no it's not! It's dishonest work! Perfect!

good_for_you.npc_text: Good for me! Bad for everyone else! But mostly good for me! That's capitalism, baby! Or chicken-ism. Whatever!

im_out_bye.npc_text: Out? OUT? Fine! But you'll be back! They always come back! Usually for refunds! Which I don't give! Bye!

definitely_something.npc_text: Something is better than nothing! That's my business motto! 'Madame Cluckstra: Definitely Something!' Trademark pending!

goodbye_cluckstra_final.npc_text: A formal farewell! How fancy! Goodbye, brave hero! May your future be marginally better than my predictions! BAWK!

good_talk_bye.npc_text: Good talk? GOOD TALK? That's the nicest review I've gotten! Five stars! Would confuse again! Come back anytime!

dream_big_2.npc_text: Dream big? I'm a chicken! My big dreams involve not being dinner! But sure! DREAM BIG! Top of the coop! Woo!

honest_living.npc_text: Honest? I'm literally a fraud! But honestly fraudulent! That's something! Not much! But something! Capitalism!

cant_wait_bye.npc_text: Can't wait? Me neither! For different reasons! You for entertainment, me for validation! See you soon!

see_tuesday.npc_text: Tuesday it is! The worst day! We'll make it worse together! With snacks! Can't be too sad with snacks!

thats_the_spirit.npc_text: That's the spirit! The mildly disappointed but still functioning spirit! My favorite kind! Keep it up!

bye_entrepreneur.npc_text: Entrepreneur! I like that! Sounds better than 'chicken who lies for coins!' Marketing is everything! Bye!

living_the_dream.npc_text: Living the dream! The small, feathered, fraudulent dream! But it's MY dream! And that's... something! Bye!

never_change.npc_text: Never change? Done! Changing requires effort! I'm conserving energy for more bad prophecies! Efficiency!

perfect_goodbye.npc_text: Perfect goodbye? Let me try! *clears throat* Farewell, traveler! May your path be... pathlike! Nailed it!

petty_but_fair.npc_text: Petty but fair is my entire personality! You get me! You really get me! Come back when you need more petty wisdom!

going_now.npc_text: Going? Already? But we were having such a mediocre time! Fine! Leave! See if I care! I don't! Much! Bye!

worth_for_story.npc_text: Exactly! You can tell everyone about the emotionally manipulative chicken! I'm basically famous! By proxy! The best kind!

bye_final.npc_text: Finally! The ultimate goodbye! Quick and painless! Like ripping off a bandage! Or a feather! Don't rip my feathers! Bye!

you_tried.npc_text: I did try! That's more than most chickens! They just cluck! I cluck WITH PURPOSE! And fraud! But still! Effort!

time_go_final.npc_text: Time to go! Time flies! Unlike chickens! We don't fly! Physics is cruel! Anyway, fly away, non-chicken! Bye!

deep_chicken_thoughts.npc_text: Deep chicken thoughts! That's my brand! Surface-level depth! Shallow philosophy! It's a niche market! But it's mine!

tuesday_was_rough.npc_text: The roughest! One day you're mindless, next day you're mindFUL! It's a lot! But here we are! Conscious and coping!

farewell_cluckstra.npc_text: Farewell to you too! May your adventures be less confusing than my prophecies! But not too much less! Mystery is fun!

youll_do_great.npc_text: I'll do great? At being adequate? Yes! I'll be the greatest adequate psychic chicken ever! Low bar! I'll clear it!

farewell_final.npc_text: The final farewell! So dramatic! So final! Until next time! Because there's always a next time! Prophecy!

good_luck_with.npc_text: Thanks! Luck is just preparation meeting opportunity! I'm unprepared for unopportunities! But optimistic! Sort of!

need_better_marketing.npc_text: Better marketing? What's wrong with 'Disappointing But Honest'? It's authentic! Authentically terrible! But authentic!

leaving.npc_text: Leaving? But I haven't told you about the curse of eternal mild inconvenience! Fine! Go! Miss out on quality doom!

leaving_early.npc_text: Leaving already? But I had a whole bit about your future containing disappointment! It was going to be vaguely ominous!

goodbye_forever.npc_text: Forever? That's what they all say! But you'll be back! When you need vague reassurance about your poor life choices! See you soon!

goodbye_final.npc_text: The final goodbye! So dramatic! I predict you'll think of me at least once! Probably with confusion! That's my legacy!

goodbye_cluckstra.npc_text: Goodbye to you too! May your future be less vague than my prophecies! But not too much less! Keep some mystery!

stay_positive.npc_text: Stay positive? I'm a cynical chicken! Positivity is for birds who can actually fly! But I'll try! For you! Briefly!

drink_that.npc_text: You'd drink chicken tears? That's... concerning. But entrepreneurial! We could bottle it! 'Essence of Despair!'

need_help.npc_text: Help? I'm beyond help! I'm a self-aware chicken in an existential crisis! But thanks for caring! It's more than the farmer does!

get_help.npc_text: Get help? For me? That's sweet! But what therapist takes chickens? 'Tell me about your mother.' She was an EGG!

no_guarantees.npc_text: No guarantees? HONESTY! I respect that! At least when you eat me, it won't be a surprise! That's... something!

thats_depressing.npc_text: Depressing? Welcome to my world! Population: me and whatever optimism I haven't pecked to death yet!

cool_number.npc_text: Cool? It's just a number! Like I'm just poultry! But sure, 47 is the coolest number in the coop! Low bar!

for_the_best.npc_text: For the best? Being unnamed? That's the most depressing optimism I've heard! You'd fit right in here!

not_really.npc_text: Not really? Nobody's ever happy with straight answers! Fine! The fox is maybe real and definitely perhaps dangerous! Better?

thanks_i_guess.npc_text: Guessing at gratitude? That's my specialty! You're maybe welcome! Or possibly not! We'll never know!

kill_fox.npc_text: You'll kill it? Great! Or terrible! Depends on your perspective! The fox's perspective is definitely terrible!

might_kill.npc_text: Kill me? At least I'd die flying! That's more than most chickens get! Do it! Make me a legend! A brief, airborne legend!

lets_not.npc_text: Party pooper! Fine! Keep me grounded! Literally! I'll just dream of flight! Like always! *sad cluck*

should_stop.npc_text: Stop? When I'm finally achieving my dreams? Never! Throw me into the stratosphere! I demand it!

have_issues.npc_text: Issues? I'm a talking chicken with a death wish and a flying fetish! Of course I have issues! Subscriptions even!

need_help.npc_text: Help? From who? A poultry therapist? 'Tell me about your coop.' It's small and smells! There! Cured!

something_else.npc_text: Something else? Fine! Let's discuss... the weather! It exists! Sometimes it's wet! Riveting! Better than philosophy?

hit_head.npc_text: Hit me? To forget? Tempting! But I need my remaining brain cells for prophecy! Bad prophecy needs SOME neurons!

knowledge_burden.npc_text: Exactly! Ignorance was bliss! Now I know about mortality, meaning, and that eggs could've been my children! Too much!

have_issues.npc_text: Issues? Me? I'm just a psychic chicken questioning existence while scamming adventurers! Totally normal!

second_thoughts_name.npc_text: Second thoughts? About MY name? After I emotionally accepted it? This is why I have trust issues!

it_suits.npc_text: It suits me? A pretentious name for a pretentious chicken! We're perfect for each other! The name and me! Not us! Unless?

nice_to_meet.npc_text: Nice to meet me? That's a first! Usually it's 'weird to meet you' or 'please stop talking.' This is progress!

died_loved.npc_text: *from the distance* I REGRET NOTHING! TELL MY STORY! THE CHICKEN WHO FLEW! BRIEFLY! PAINFULLY! BUT FLEW!

chicken_worry.npc_text: *weakly* I'm... I'm okay! Everything hurts but I FLEW! Did you see? DID YOU SEE?! Worth it!

no_more_throwing.npc_text: No more? But... but I almost touched a cloud! Fine! I'll just dream about it! While eating corn! Boring corn!

youre_insane.npc_text: Insane? Yes! But I'm an insane chicken who FLEW! That's more than most! Sanity is overrated anyway!

if_survive.npc_text: IF? There's no if! I'm invincible! I flew! I'm basically a superhero now! Captain Cluck! No, that's terrible.

no_regrets.npc_text: No regrets? That's the spirit! Live every day like it's your last! Which for a chicken... might be accurate!

want_corn.npc_text: Corn? You're offering me corn? I... yes. Yes, I want corn. This is the best day ever! Low bar! But still!

good_chicken.npc_text: Good chicken? GOOD CHICKEN? I'm not crying! You're crying! This is just... rain! Localized entirely on my face!

this_is_weird.npc_text: Weird? Everything about this is weird! You're talking to a psychic chicken! Embrace the weird! Or run! Both valid!

not_dying.npc_text: Not dying? Just having feelings? Oh. That's... worse? Better? I don't know how emotions work! I'm new to this!

drama_queen.npc_text: Drama QUEEN? I prefer 'Drama Chicken!' Or 'Dramatically Accurate Fortune Fowl!' Trademark pending!

feathers_on_me.npc_text: Feathers? Well excuse me for molting during an emotional moment! This is why I don't do feelings!

talk_about_it.npc_text: Talk? About feelings? With a human? This is therapy! Cheap therapy! You're not licensed, are you?

here_for_you.npc_text: Here for me? Nobody's ever... I mean... BAWK! I'm fine! Totally fine! Not crying! It's eye rain!

hold_close.npc_text: *muffled chicken sounds* This is the best worst day of my life. I'm emotionally compromised and covered in feathers!

until_dinner.npc_text: THERE IT IS! The dark humor! I can work with that! We understand each other! Twisted minds think alike!

just_kidding_2.npc_text: Just kidding? About eating me or about being friends? Don't answer! I choose to believe the best! Delusion is my friend!

dark_humor_helps.npc_text: It does help! Laughing at the void! The void laughs back! We all laugh! Then cry! It's very healthy!

too_far.npc_text: Too far? There IS no too far in the chicken-humor continuum! But apology accepted! We're still friends! Twisted friends!

hope_worth_it.npc_text: You're right! Hope is worth it! Even for a chicken! Especially for a chicken! I'll hope! Carefully! With low expectations!

not_better.npc_text: Not better? Fine! How about this: Why did the chicken cross the road? To escape existential dread! Still me! Always me!

i_laughed.npc_text: You laughed? At my pain? That's... actually what I was going for! Success! My comedy career begins! And ends!

accept_hug.npc_text: *happy chicken noises* This is nice! Weird! But nice! Don't tell the other chickens! I have a reputation!

chicken_hugs.npc_text: Chicken hugs! It's like regular hugs but with more feathers and existential dread! Patent pending!

see_you_around.npc_text: Around? I'm always around! In this exact spot! Because I'm a chicken! Limited mobility! But yes! See you... here!

prophecies_suck.npc_text: They DO suck! That's the point! Low expectations mean rare disappointment! I'm a genius! A terrible genius! Thanks!

goodbye_friend.npc_text: Friend? FRIEND? We're friends now? When did that happen? I don't do friends! I do customers! But... bye, friend!

blame_fish.npc_text: Yes! Blame Finnegan! He's had it too good for too long with his 'accurate' weather predictions! Stupid fish!

too_weird.npc_text: Too weird is my comfort zone! Normal is for chickens who can't talk! I'm special! Specially weird! Bye, normie!

leaving_now.npc_text: Leaving? Fine! But remember: I correctly predicted you'd leave eventually! That's a win! I'm counting it!

better_than_him.npc_text: Better than a fish! That's going on my resume! 'Superior to aquatic competition!' It's something! Not much! But something!

mystically_useless.npc_text: Mystically useless! That's my tagline! It's honest advertising! 'Come for the mystery, stay for the uselessness!'

goodbye_forever_2.npc_text: Forever? That's very final! I predict you'll be back! My predictions are usually wrong! So... bye forever! Maybe!

should_go_final.npc_text: You should! You really should! Before I charge you for this extended consultation! Wisdom isn't free! Even bad wisdom!

keep_talking.npc_text: Keep talking? About my existence? It's chickens all the way down! And up! And sideways! Existence is confusing! Let's stop!

last_tuesday_again.npc_text: It was a very significant Tuesday! That's when I realized I could think! Do you know how terrifying that is? One day you're pecking corn, next day you're contemplating mortality. Tuesday's are cursed.

perfect_slogan.npc_text: Right? Marketing genius! 'Impossibly Vague Since Last Tuesday' - it says nothing and everything! Like my prophecies!

im_out.npc_text: Out? Good choice! Leave while your sanity's intact! What's left of it after talking to a psychic chicken! Bye!

awkward_goodbye.npc_text: Awkward? AWKWARD? This whole conversation has been awkward! I'm a crying psychic chicken! Peak awkward! Bye!

pull_together.npc_text: *sniffles* Pull myself together? I'm a chicken having an existential crisis! This IS together! But fine! *deep breath* I'm professional!

what_wisdom.npc_text: What wisdom? Good question! Let me check... *pecks ground* ... Nope! No wisdom here! Just feathers and fraud!

bye_cluckstra.npc_text: Bye! Don't forget to leave a review! 'One star: Chicken talked too much about philosophy, not enough about corn.' Fair!

better_work.npc_text: It better work? No guarantees! I'm not responsible for boss-cheese interactions! But probably! Maybe! Good luck!

thanks_mom.npc_text: Mom? MOM? I'm nobody's mother! I might be male! Gender is complex! Especially for psychic chickens! But you're welcome!

trees_cant_hurt.npc_text: Can't hurt me? You've never been pecked by an angry oak! Wait, that doesn't happen. Unless... THE COUNCIL! *paranoid cluck*

secret_safe_3.npc_text: Good! The trees have eyes! And leaves! Mostly leaves! But paranoia keeps me sharp! Sharp as a chicken can be!

time_go.npc_text: Time to go! The prophecy fulfills itself! You're leaving! I predicted this! Sort of! Vaguely! Still counts!

beautiful_poetry.npc_text: Beautiful? Your standards for poetry are wonderfully low! I should write more! 'Ode to corn: Yellow.' Done!

good_thanks.npc_text: Good? GOOD? After all we've been through? The prophecies? The tears? The existential dread? Just 'good'? Fair!

last_fortune.npc_text: One last fortune! *dramatic pause* You will soon... leave! And I will... stay here! Being a chicken! Profound!

philosophy_again.npc_text: Always philosophy! It's free and sounds smart! 'The river flows because it must.' See? Meaningless but deep-sounding!

goodbye.npc_text: Just goodbye? No fanfare? No drama? Fine! Goodbye! May your futures be less vague than my prophecies!

got_emotional.npc_text: Emotional? This whole conversation's been an emotional rollercoaster! For me! You're just standing there! Judging!

pat_chicken.npc_text: *freezes* Physical affection? I don't... this is... *melts* Okay this is nice. Don't tell the other frauds!

i_am_hungry.npc_text: See? SEE? The prophecy works! You're hungry! Go eat! But not chicken! Eat something else! Like disappointment! It's calorie-free!

want_refund.npc_text: Refund? REFUND? Read the sign! 'No refunds, no exchanges, no hope!' It's right there! In invisible ink! Binding!

thats_incredible.npc_text: Incredible? It's completely made up! Or is it? No, it is. Probably. Unless? No. But maybe? Confusion is my brand!

youre_best.npc_text: The best? THE BEST? Stop! My ego! It's growing! Soon I'll be insufferable! More insufferable! Is that possible? Yes!

how_much_need.npc_text: Just 50 gold pieces! For a tiny hat! It's a bargain! For the hat maker! Not for me! But I'm committed now!

thats_ridiculous.npc_text: Ridiculous? That's my middle name! Madame Ridiculous Cluckstra! It's on my birth certificate! Which I don't have! Because I'm a chicken!

spoke_to_me.npc_text: It spoke to you? My nonsense? You need help! Professional help! Not chicken help! But I'm flattered! Confused but flattered!

done_here_2.npc_text: Done? With my wisdom? Your loss! You'll miss my vague predictions and confusing metaphors! They'll haunt you! Vaguely!

write_another.npc_text: Another poem? I'm not a poetry machine! I'm a fraud machine! But fine! 'Roses are red, I am not. The end.' Masterpiece!

sword_tip_gold.npc_text: Gold? GOLD? This tip could save your life! Or at least your wallet! Tell everyone! Except the shopkeeper! He's sensitive!

more_secrets.npc_text: More secrets? I've said too much already! The Council of Vague Entities will have my feathers! But... check under rocks. Sometimes... things.

secret_safe_2.npc_text: Good! Can't have people thinking I'm actually helpful! I have a reputation! A terrible reputation! But it's mine!

thanks_anyway.npc_text: Thanks anyway? THANKS ANYWAY? That's the nicest dismissal I've ever gotten! Usually it's just thrown vegetables!

so_weird.npc_text: Weird? That's my brand! Weird and vague! It's a niche market but someone has to fill it! That someone is me! Unfortunately!

now_interested.npc_text: NOW you're interested? After I've compromised operational security? The trees are probably listening! *paranoid pecking*

bad_review.npc_text: Bad review? Add it to the pile! I frame them! 'One star: Too much existential dread.' That's a feature, not a bug!

reviews_awful.npc_text: Awful? They're hilariously awful! 'Zero stars: Made me question reality.' That's my best one! I'm proud of that!

pass.npc_text: Pass? On my romantic insights? Your loss! You'll never know if your true love has... a face! And hair! Maybe!

how_know.npc_text: How did I know? I'm PSYCHIC! Also, everyone's love life is disappointing. It's statistics! Not psychic powers! But mostly psychic powers!

down_capitalism.npc_text: Down with capitalism? Says the person paying a chicken for prophecies! We're all part of the system! BAWK THE SYSTEM!

potions_work.npc_text: They work? So do my prophecies! Eventually! Something I say will come true! Law of averages! Or magic! Probably averages!

youre_fired.npc_text: Fired? You can't fire me! I don't work for you! I work for the cosmic forces of disappointment! They have great benefits! All disappointment!

had_hope.npc_text: Hope? HOPE? In a psychic chicken? Your optimism is admirable! Misguided! But admirable! Never change! Or do! Free will!

common_sense.npc_text: Common sense? I don't deal in common sense! I deal in UNcommon NONsense! It's a much smaller market! But it's mine!

which_shopkeeper.npc_text: Which one? ALL OF THEM! It's a conspiracy! Big Shopkeep! They meet on Wednesdays! Probably! I'm not invited!

discouraging.npc_text: Discouraging? That's my specialty! 'Madame Cluckstra: Professionally Discouraging Since Last Tuesday!' Catchy!

spider_free.npc_text: Spider-free treasure? What are you, picky? Fine! Check... the gift shop. They sell 'treasure.' It's overpriced junk! But no spiders!

safe_for_now.npc_text: For now? FOR NOW? That's ominous! I like it! Keep them guessing! Will you eat me? Won't you? Suspense!

dont_push.npc_text: Don't push it? I'm a chicken! Pushing it is all I have! That and bad prophecies! It's a living! Barely!

one_real.npc_text: One REAL prophecy? Fine! Here it is: One day, you'll remember this conversation and think 'That chicken was weird.' PROPHECY!

tempting.npc_text: Tempting? TEMPTING? Please don't! I'm flammable! And I have dreams! Small dreams! But dreams! Mostly about corn!

happy_prophecy.npc_text: Happy? HAPPY? I don't do happy! Best I can do is 'mildly less disappointing.' You'll find a penny! There! Happy enough?

stop_cursing.npc_text: It's not cursing! It's predicting! There's a difference! Curses are magic! My predictions are... also magic! Wait. Hmm.

when.npc_text: When? When?! If I knew WHEN, I'd be a GOOD psychic! It's sometime between now and the heat death of the universe! Probably!

worth_copper.npc_text: Worth it? WORTH IT? You're my new favorite customer! Low standards and disposable income! The perfect combination!

respect_hustle.npc_text: Respect the hustle! That's all I ask! Well, that and five copper! But mostly respect! And copper! Both!

mental_gymnastics.npc_text: Mental gymnastics? I'm a mental Olympic athlete! Gold medal in rationalization! Silver in self-deception! No bronze. I quit!

cake_hurts.npc_text: It hurts? The cake truth always hurts! But at least you know now! Knowledge is power! Disappointing, cake-less power!

more_tips.npc_text: MORE tips? Greedy! Fine! Tip: Water is wet! Fire is hot! I'm a fraud! These are freebies! You're welcome!

ill_do_it.npc_text: You'll do it? You'll actually confront my competition? This is the nicest thing! I might cry! Again! Professional hazard!

both_frauds.npc_text: Both frauds? Yes! But I'm the HONEST fraud! That makes me... still a fraud! But with integrity! Sort of!

why_bother.npc_text: Why bother? Excellent question! I ask myself that every day! The answer? Stubbornness! And coins! Mostly stubbornness!

great_directions.npc_text: Great? They're terrible! That's the point! Low expectations! Meet them every time! It's called consistency!

done_here.npc_text: Done? Already? But I had seventeen more vague predictions! Fine! Leave! Miss out on quality confusion!

expected_better.npc_text: Expected better? From ME? Your optimism is touching! And misguided! Mostly misguided! But still touching!

brain_hurts.npc_text: Brain hurts? That means it's working! Or having an aneurysm! Probably the first one! Maybe! Disclaimer: Not a doctor!

youre_poet.npc_text: A poet? Me? More like a poe-NOT! Ha! That's comedy! Bad comedy! Like my poetry! Full circle!

do_another.npc_text: 'The meaning of life is... *dramatic pause* ...what you're doing while looking for it.' DEEP! That'll be ten copper!

genius.npc_text: Genius? That's a strong word! I prefer 'adequately clever' or 'surprisingly articulate for poultry.' But I'll take genius!

please_stop.npc_text: Stop? STOP? Fine! My genius is unappreciated! I'll take my profound gibberish elsewhere! The dirt! I'll tell the dirt!

sounds_right.npc_text: Sounds right? It's completely generic! That's the beauty! It applies to everyone! Universal disappointment! My specialty!

already_crying.npc_text: Already crying? My prophecy came true! I'm getting better at this! Or you're having a rough day. Both? Probably both.

uselessly_vague.npc_text: Uselessly vague is my brand! It's on my business card! Well, it would be if I had business cards! Or could write!

living_dream.npc_text: Living the dream! The tiny, feathered, fraudulent dream! It's not much of a dream! But it's mine!

thats_adorable.npc_text: Adorable? ADORABLE? I'm a serious business chicken! Not adorable! Mysterious! Mystical! Okay, maybe a little adorable.

hate_metaphors.npc_text: Hate metaphors? They're like... something you hate! See? I'm bad at them too! We have so much in common!

time_to_go.npc_text: Time to go! Like sands through an hourglass! Or corn through a chicken! These are the days of our lives!

forget_it.npc_text: Forget it? Already forgotten! That's customer service! Bad customer service! But service nonetheless!

check_them_all.npc_text: All of them? That's the spirit! Waste time efficiently! Check everywhere! Find nothing! It builds character!

look_delicious.npc_text: DELICIOUS? And here I thought we had something! Fine! But I'm mostly feathers! Very disappointing meal!

trust_me.npc_text: Trust you? A human? Who talks to chickens? My judgment is questionable! But okay! Trust established! Don't break it!

vegetables_friends.npc_text: Vegetables have feelings too? Great! Now I feel guilty about lunch! Thanks! More existential weight! Just what I needed!

time_leave.npc_text: Time to leave! The prophecy fulfills itself! Again! I'm so good at predicting departures! It's my only accurate skill!

wheres_fish.npc_text: The pond! By the mill! Can't miss him! He's the one that's wrong about everything! Except weather. Stupid accurate fish!

should_find_him.npc_text: Find him? Fraternizing with the competition? I'm hurt! But go ahead! His prophecies are boring! 'It will rain.' WHERE'S THE DRAMA?

telling_everyone.npc_text: EVERYONE? No! My secret tree connections! Ruined! I'll be blacklisted from the forest! This is a disaster! A predictable disaster!

secrets_amazing.npc_text: Amazing? They're accidental! I talk too much! It's a character flaw! That apparently people enjoy! Marketing genius!

end.npc_text: Off you go then! Remember: you voluntarily spent time talking to a fraudulent psychic chicken today. What does that say about YOUR life choices? Don't answer that. BAWK!
